title: No surrender mod ; PLS
body: /I wonder if some people can play "no surrender" mod, where there is no surrendering, one team has to take the nexus to win. To not get in a loop where probably everyone disconnects, if the 2 teams play for about 2 hours without winning the game becomes a tie.  If this kind of mod comes out i'd love to play it/

replies.body: no surrender option is such a minor change, I doubt they'd ever put in this mode. there's no real point to it, either. if you don't want to surrender, vote no. but is 4/5 of the team thinks it's unwinnable, they probably won't have the mindset to win anyway. the only change I see this mode having is people wishing they COULD surrender...

Modding the game is strictly forbidden according to the Summoner's Code. In a game this competitive, I'm glad it's the way it is. If you disagree, you may find a sandbox game more enjoyable.
EDIT: For clarity, it's impossible to "mod" only certain games the way the league client currently is.
I doubt enough people would play this to support a healthy queue time.

Some of the players could play like this, if people don't like it they would stop playing in this mod. It's purpose is not to make the majority play like this, it's just a fun way to enjoy the game. Even though the majority won't play in this mod, the minority of the players playing would make this idea fine right ?  /Just name it the "Try-Harder mode"/
